storyInfo: City guard Ambriel is assigned to watch over one of the Holy City's walls but repeatedly finds Laterans who challenge the rules in the name of freedom.

attributes.content: Oh... Well, there's the bell. A shame our lessons must always end so soon.
Some of you may have sneaked away before the bell rang, and a couple of you are having a nice nap on your desks, but there's nothing wrong with that.
'Commune cum Sclopetis' is a life-long course.
Now, my dear students, you have all obtained your guardian guns.
But have you thought about what they'll be guarding?
Oops, did I fall asleep...? Urgh.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: A call from the boss...?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Voice mail sounds about nice.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: AMBRIEL!
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: What is it, Captain? I've been at my post this whole time.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: 'At your post'? How many times do I have to tell you?! The Pontifica Cohors must act in a manner befitting the station!
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: On your feet! I won't have you lie on top of Laterano's holy walls! Next time I catch you sleeping on the job, you'll be sleeping in a saint statue's arms!
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Wait, is that really an option—
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Don't you muck about with me! Don't forget, we are the guardians of—
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: Laterano's honor, yes, yes.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Hmph. I hope you can actually take that to heart. Today's your last chance. One more mess-up, and you're out of the Pontifica Cohors!
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: *sigh*
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: A watchtower.
This is where city guard Ambriel has found herself posted. A wide wall separates the business district from the leisure district, and attempts to hop the wall are frequent.
Her job is extremely simple: stop people from doing so. It is also extremely difficult, for none can hope to contain the free spirits of Laterano.
She nibbles on some chocolate, watching the Holy City's blue and white mingle and extend.
Bell tower, all clear. School, all clear. Business district, all clear.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Nothing unusual so far...
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: The guard scribbles her report into her terminal without a care before lying down once more atop the marble wall, staring at the clouds drifting overhead.
A thought has also drifted across her mind more than once.
This Holy City, tranquil, peaceful and unchanging—
Is like the sky reflected upon the land.
Where should I go this time after work...
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Ouch!
That hurt... Who threw that chocolate at me? I was so close...
attributes.name: Anxious Lateran

attributes.content: Sorry, but this is off-limits.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Scaling the wall constitutes reckless behavior that not only violates the Pagus management law but also impedes the patrol duties of the Pontifica Cohors.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Anxious Lateran

attributes.content: Look, I'm just doing my job here. That whole spiel? Just repeating what my boss told me to say.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: If you have any complaints, you can go to the Guard offices to state your case, or file an appeal at the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: But if you have a justified reason, I could turn a blind eye.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: A justified reason?
attributes.name: Anxious Lateran

attributes.content: I-I'm in a hurry... If I don't hop over this wall, I'd have to circle all the way around the wall.
attributes.name: Anxious Lateran

attributes.content: See that side door over there? Should save you some time.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Just wait until my shift's over and take that door.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Consider yourself rejected.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Wait until your shift's over? That's no good, I'm definitely going to miss it!
attributes.name: Anxious Lateran

attributes.content: Miss what?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: I... I can't say...
attributes.name: Anxious Lateran

attributes.content: Executing some secret will?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Anxious Lateran

attributes.content: That's what I thought, you don't look the part... Transporting something important?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: (Shakes head)
attributes.name: Anxious Lateran

attributes.content: Not that you look like a Messenger either...
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: I-It's something along those lines, though!
attributes.name: Anxious Lateran

attributes.content: Anyways, this is really important to me! Today's my only chance!
attributes.name: Anxious Lateran

attributes.content: You're laying it on a bit too thick here.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Sorry, I really can't delay any longer—
attributes.name: Anxious Lateran

attributes.content: S-Stop chasing me!
attributes.name: Nimble Lateran

attributes.content: Ah! Which way should I go... This way!
attributes.name: Nimble Lateran

attributes.content: Please comply with the Notarial Hall and stop resisting your arrest!
attributes.name: Forthright Executor

attributes.content: Hmm? A fork in the road? Which one did he take...
attributes.name: Forthright Executor

attributes.content: (Points to the left)
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Aha! Gratias, Seniora!
attributes.name: Forthright Executor

attributes.content: So, uh, Seniora Guard, can I go now?
attributes.name: Anxious Lateran

attributes.content: Wait a sec, I've got an idea.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: A small alleyway.
The sun is beginning to sink toward the west. The shadows of the buildings cover half the alley. The perfect place to take a nap.
The guard covers her ears.
Your idea was blowing a hole in the wall with explosives?
attributes.name: Anxious Lateran

attributes.content: Yeah. Anything wrong with that?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: The law says you can't hop over the wall. Doesn't say anything about opening a hole in it.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Why are you still standing there? I thought you were in a hurry?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Multas gratias!
attributes.name: Anxious Lateran

attributes.content: I think I'm going to need some help from an executor, Senior.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Certainly. It's the least I can do.
attributes.name: Forthright Executor

attributes.content: On April 27th, 16:27, a legal detonation was performed on a wall at the intersection of Panela and Souffle.
attributes.name: Forthright Executor

attributes.content: The completion of the process was witnessed by Notarial Hall Executor Richele.
attributes.name: Forthright Executor

attributes.content: Pontifica Cohors sniper, Ambriel, also ensured that no citizens or property were harmed by the blast.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: There, all done.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Thanks a bunch.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Don't mention it. After all, I was only able to catch this young fellow thanks to you.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Hey. All I did was point the way.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Hahaha, no need to be so humble, I know what happened.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: The pillar that blocked his escape... you shot it down, didn't you? He would have slipped away otherwise.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: The distance is most impressive. It's kind of scary to think that the Pontifica Cohors have such remarkable snipers in their ranks.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Wait, you think I'm impressive?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: I'd say you executors who can handle things with your bare hands are the truly scary ones.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: It's hard to imagine a situation where you'd actually need to use your gun in peaceful Laterano.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Hahaha, if I didn't use my gun, how could I win donuts at the dessert shop shooting competitions?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Well then, Seniora Guard, if there's nothing else, I'll be heading back to make my report now.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Thankfully, this hole serves as a handy shortcut.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Hmm...? Wait, this road seems to lead right there.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: My, I never thought I'd make it in time today! No time to delay!
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Whoa! That hurts! Slow down!
attributes.name: Handcuffed Lateran

attributes.content: What is this place everyone keeps talking about? How mysterious.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: AMBRIEL!!!
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: What is it now, Captain?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: You better have a good explanation for why there's a big hole in the wall.
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: About that... There weren't any violations. I made sure of it while I stayed at my post.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Don't you get cute with me, you hear!?
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: From now on, you've got one more assignment. Don't let anyone through that hole!
attributes.name: Voice from the Phone

attributes.content: A city bathed in the golden glow of the setting sun.
As she places two traffic cones in front of the hole, Ambriel senses someone watching her.
Seriously, Captain?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: I get that you need to supervise me, but do you really have to hide like that?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Whoever's hiding behind the tree carefully pokes their head out. When their eyes meet, the person quickly hides their face again.
...A kid?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: D-Don't come over here!
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: Say, school's not out yet, is it?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: If you go back to class like a good kid, I'll pretend I didn't see you, okay?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: D-Don't go, either!
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: Just... Just stay right there...
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: I... I just want to look at your gun.
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: My gun?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: I guess you do look about right for the age when you'd pick your guardian gun.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Here, you can get a better look this way.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: What, disappointed?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Wh-Why...?
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: Why... does it look like the ones the saint statues hold?
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: Well...
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Still haven't decided on a guardian gun?
attributes.name: Firearms Workshop Gunsmith

attributes.content: We've shown you everything in our stock. If you don't like any of them, then maybe—
attributes.name: Firearms Workshop Gunsmith

attributes.content: I want that one.
attributes.name: Young Ambriel

attributes.content: Which one?
attributes.name: Firearms Workshop Gunsmith

attributes.content: ...The one that the saint statue is holding?
attributes.name: Firearms Workshop Gunsmith

attributes.content: That's just a carving, though.
attributes.name: Firearms Workshop Gunsmith

attributes.content: ...I get it.
attributes.name: Firearms Workshop Gunsmith

attributes.content: It's a classic model. I should be able to find a blueprint. It'll take a while to make it though, so come back in a few days.
attributes.name: Firearms Workshop Gunsmith

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Young Ambriel

attributes.content: It's nothing.
attributes.name: Firearms Workshop Gunsmith

attributes.content: Afterall, it's rare to see kids who look up to the saints nowadays.
attributes.name: Firearms Workshop Gunsmith

attributes.content: I didn't pick my guardian gun for any particular reason.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: It's light and got a good range. That's all.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: A good range? But I...
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: Don't worry. You don't need crazy talent to shoot it, or some kind of lofty ideal.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: It's just a gun. You can pick one just like it.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: As long as it's what you want.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: Sorry, I think you got me wrong.
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: The books say the bullets of the saints are how the Law punishes people. If you get hit by one, it hurts really really bad.
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: I just wanted to make sure if I sneaked through that hole, you wouldn't shoot me with that saint's gun, right?
attributes.name: Shy Child

attributes.content: After watching the child head back to school, the guard turns a corner.
The evening bells have not yet rung, and there are only a few pedestrians on the street.
Two scoops of chocolate ice cream, and sprinkle on some cacao nibs.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Sure thing.
attributes.name: Friendly Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Not much business today?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Tell me about it. Might be because the dessert shop on Panela's holding some limited-time event.
attributes.name: Friendly Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Limited-time event?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Yeah. Apparently they're selling some sort of special-edition 'chocolate sunset mousse' just for today, and only until 5:30.
attributes.name: Friendly Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Special-edition 'chocolate sunset mousse'...
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: 5:30 you say... Lots of people will still be stuck at work or school, though. They wouldn't be able to make it, would they?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Exactly.
attributes.name: Friendly Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Even so, many people would rather take the leave to buy it. Can't compete with that now, can I?
attributes.name: Friendly Shopkeeper

attributes.content: Well, that explains a lot...
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Here, make sure not to drop it. Thank you, come again!
attributes.name: Friendly Shopkeeper

attributes.content: The guard turns her head to see a manhole cover rattle through the corner of her eye. A strange sight, all things considered.
Hey, hey!
Is anyone there? Can someone help me?
...*sigh*
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Here, grab onto my gun and I'll pull you out.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Oof, I suppose that's me saved...
attributes.name: Embarrassed Old Man

attributes.content: Hmm? This gun of yours... Where have I seen that model before...?
attributes.name: Embarrassed Old Man

attributes.content: ...Magister?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Well, if it isn't Ambriel. It's been quite a while.
attributes.name: Embarrassed Old Man

attributes.content: I'm glad to see you've grown to become an outstanding city guard.
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: Why were you in the sewer...?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Ahaha, well, I was communing with my guardian gun, just like how I used to teach you. Do you remember?
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: You mean that one class during detention?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: My dad made a super-sweet shortcake! Who wants some?!
attributes.name: Voice From Outside

attributes.content: Oh, and who wants some honey cystymilkshakes from my family's shop?
attributes.name: Voice From Outside

attributes.content: Hey! What's the big idea? Give me back my chocolate! Give it back!
attributes.name: Voice From Outside

attributes.content: How long has it been? I'm so hungry...
attributes.name: Student In Detention

attributes.content: If I boost myself up with this chair, I can climb out through the window...
attributes.name: Student In Detention

attributes.content: Oh, good, it seems you really have learned something.
attributes.name: School Magister

attributes.content: Magister?! I wasn't going to... I-I swear I won't do it again next time...
attributes.name: Student In Detention

attributes.content: I understand. Detention can lock away the body, but it cannot lock away the spirit.
attributes.name: School Magister

attributes.content: You used your gun to break the glass. I would say that's you communing with your gun.
attributes.name: School Magister

attributes.content: I know it's against school rules, but I...
attributes.name: Student In Detention

attributes.content: Do not worry, child.
attributes.name: School Magister

attributes.content: The reason why guns are so important is because they allow you to come face-to-face with your heart.
attributes.name: School Magister

attributes.content: And this is what allows Laterano to continue improving and become the paradise that guards its people's hopes and dreams.
attributes.name: School Magister

attributes.content: Hopes and dreams...
attributes.name: Student In Detention

attributes.content: Tell me, Ambriel, what is it you want most right now?
attributes.name: School Magister

attributes.content: I... I want...
attributes.name: Student In Detention

attributes.content: Chocolate.
attributes.name: Student In Detention

attributes.content: Yes, yes, that's right! I hope you're not holding a grudge against me for keeping you in detention.
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: But judging by that chocolate ice cream in your hand, I can see you haven't forgotten my advice.
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: Ah, you kind of ruined it for me...
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: So, Magister, what kind of hopes and dreams dropped you into the sewer?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Is it really okay to leave your students alone and sneak out like this?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Haha, look, this is my guardian gun. I was praying with it in the school's prayer hall when I sensed something calling out to me.
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: Following its guidance, I found a mysterious passage below the hall. When I reached the end, I saw light shining down from above...
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: I thought I was about to witness a miracle, but... as you know, I was stuck in a sewer, unable to get the manhole cover off way.
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: That's a really nice mystery story you spun up, but you just wanted to get away from work, didn't you, Magister?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: No, I think my guardian gun wanted something far simpler.
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: All it wanted to see was the Lateran sunset today.
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: But, if it so happens to coincide with a dessert shop's limited-time event, so much the better.
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: Figured.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: That excuse isn't enough to let you off the hook.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: You're suspected of tampering with sewer pipelines, disrupting traffic, and scaling the wall outside of designated hours, albeit through the underground...
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Alright, Ambriel, I'll head straight to the Notarial Hall later to accept my punishment.
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: But it would be a huge shame if I missed both a limited dessert and the most magnificent time of day in the Holy City.
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: At this very moment, new recruits to the Pontifica Cohors are marching in formation along the opposite side of the street.
The golden sunset falls upon their guns, the brims of their hats, and their young yet solemn faces.
Like maple syrup flowing across cystymilk toast, like honey drizzling over waffles.
Ah... I see what you mean.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: The light of the setting sun equally graces every corner of the Holy City. No wall can stop that.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: The guard picks up her rifle, aims at the top of a distant bell tower, and takes a deep breath—
Pedestrians on the street raise their heads, those at home open their windows, and nearly every Lateran in the Pagus holds their breath in unison.
The bell tolls, and several fowlbeasts, their wings a gilded gold, fly across the clear, crisp sky.
A brief silence, then cheerful mirth erupts from the Pagus, carrying the hopes and dreams of its people into the evening air.
45 minutes and 19 seconds. That's how much earlier it is than the usual bell.
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: And that's how much earlier the people of this Pagus will get off work.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: They can leave the office or school, and chat with their pals about where they're heading tonight.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: More importantly, they won't have to miss out on this beautiful sunset.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Ambriel, you let everyone out early so they could make it in time for the special event, didn't you?
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: Haha. I don't know about them, but there's still ten minutes left, so I can definitely make it.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Can we go together, Magister?
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Why of course.
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: Not going to answer that?
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: Nah, I'm done for the day.
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: Now there's the troublemaker I know.
attributes.name: Spirited Old Man

attributes.content: Strange, feels like the bell rang much earlier than usual today...
attributes.name: Lateran Passerby A

attributes.content: Wow! The sunset's beautiful!
attributes.name: Lateran Passerby B

attributes.content: I've got an idea! How about this day every year, we get out of the office an hour earlier!
attributes.name: Lateran Passerby A

attributes.content: I'm down for that!
attributes.name: Lateran Passerby B

attributes.content: The guard watches the setting sun poke out between the rosy clouds. The reflection of the Holy City in the sky blinks at her.
Before she realizes it, the street is awash with people coming and going. On this most ordinary of Lateran days, freedom and merriment fill the air.
Now this...
attributes.name: Ambriel

attributes.content: This is Laterano's honor.
attributes.name: Ambriel
